product_name: Beekman 1802Mushroom Milk Better Aging Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBeekman 1802's Mushroom Milk is a better aging goat milk eye cream that's clinically proven to reduce fine lines and dark circles in just 5 days.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces fine lines & wrinklesDecreases dark circlesInstantly hydrates and enhances radiance around the eyesSafe for sensitive eyes & skinKey IngredientsGoat Milk: Nourishes and softens the skin around the eye.Lions Mane: Smooths the appearance of crowâ€™s feet.Snow Mushroom: Cools and depuffs undereye bags.Reishi Mushroom: Lifts and firms the eyelid for a more youthful look.Kojic Acid Fungi Ferment: Helps to brighten dark circles.Sclerotium Fungi: Deeply hydrates for instant rejuvenation.5% Hexapeptide: The first clinically proven peptide to reduce wrinkle depth caused by expression lines.Formulated without fragrance, parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, alcohol, and talcResearch Results5 days to reveal youthful eyes**Clinically tested on subjects with light to deep wrinkles46% decrease in wrinkle depth****Based on two panels of 40 and 41 female volunteers between 34-60 years oldItem 2617049How To UseOn clean, dry skin, apply a pea-sized amount under the eye and around the orbital bone.Use twice daily, in the morning and at night. Apply after using moisturizer and before sun care.EXTRA CREDIT: Massage into the area between the eyebrows to help relax frown lines.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Propanediol, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, C12-16 Alcohols, Squalane, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Ganoderma Lucidum (Mushroom) Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Kojic Acid, Hericium Erinaceus/Lactobacillus/Leuconostoc/Artemisia Capillaris Leaf/Stem Ferment Filtrate (Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract), Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Triheptanoin, Pullulan, Palmitic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Citrate/Lactate/Linoleate/Oleate, C9-12 Alkane, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Sclerotium Gum, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Tocopherol ...And Kindness.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On clean, dry skin, apply a pea-sized amount under the eye and around the orbital bone.Use twice daily, in the morning and at night. Apply after using moisturizer and before sun care.EXTRA CREDIT: Massage into the area between the eyebrows to help relax frown lines.
ingredients: Hericium Erinaceus/Lactobacillus/Leuconostoc/Artemisia Capillaris Leaf/Stem Ferment Filtrate (Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract)

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I've tried a number of eye creams over the years and this one is my favorite. A little dab goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I went in to get a new concealer and the esthetician tried this around my eyes and it is wonderful!

reviews.headline: Favorite eye cream, hope they improve tube
reviews.comments: This is the only eye cream I've ever used that I like how it feels and can see a difference. My only issue with it is it is expensive and the tube often makes you waste product because a bunch of it shoots out by accident. So hopefully they improve that, and maybe I'll get more when it's on sale. :)

reviews.headline: Perfect formula
reviews.comments:
I've been using this for a little over a year and I am thoroughly happy with it. I have allergies and weepy eyes so the skin around them is always dry and sometimes flaky and inflamed. Most eye creams I've used just sit on the surface and get washed away or pill up when my eyes water. This one absorbs really well and the skin feels very nourished after it sinks in. It also smooths and calms. I will say that it doesn't really help with dark circles but the eye serum from Beekman does a good job at that so I layer the serum and then the cream. I didn't realize how much of a difference the combo was making until I ran out of the serum a couple of months ago. 

A little goes a long way with this one so the price tag if justified, in my opinion. I really only have to get a new one every 5 or 6 months and that's with twice daily use. 

This sits beautifully under makeup and is a creates a great, hydrated base for my concealer. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Solid eye cream
reviews.comments: I've accepted no eye cream will fix my dark circles and this one is no different. In terms of moisturizing it does the job and it's light weight so if you don't like heavy creams this one's for you.

reviews.headline: Happy with it
reviews.comments: I haven't been using this for very long but so far I like it. It goes on nicely, no fragrance (yay!) blends in easily, is not sticky or heavy. The area around my eyes is smooth.

reviews.headline: Visible Results
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way (as it should with the price of this eye cream), but it's well worth it. I love anything beekman and this little tube takes the cake of all their products. I use the product around my eyes but also across the fine lines on my forehead and I noticed smoother skin without having to even go through the entire tube.

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product! I noticed a dramatic difference with just 2 uses. It blends right in, no stickiness, no scent, no burning in the eyes. It's wonderful!

reviews.headline: Better aging eyes!
reviews.comments: I love that this clean formula is gentle yet effective enough to use on your eyelid, under eye, and crows feet area. Unlike most chemical products you don't have to build up your tolerance to it over time or be super careful where you put it. With consistent use I have noticed my eye area appearing firmer and brighter which is exactly what I wanted from an eye cream for so long! And it does not feel like a heavy cream whatsoever.

reviews.headline: one use
reviews.comments:
Ordered the Beekman Mushroom Milk eye creme and used once, picture attached before and after. I personally enjoy the tube package vs a jar. Any jar products I use small spatula, no fingers in jar. 
Used a small amount and noticed the fine lines improved almost immediately. I would recommend and will buy again.

reviews.headline: Soothes dry skin around eyes
reviews.comments: This is the only eye cream that was able to repair the extremely dry skin around my eyes caused by the winter air.

reviews.headline: love this cream
reviews.comments: amazing

reviews.headline: Irritating
reviews.comments: This product initially felt great, but then I woke up in the middle of the night because thd skin around my eyes was burning. I washed it off, but my eyes stayed swollen for about 24 hours.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I've tried a few other eye creams and like this one the best. You don't need to use very much of it.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I'm 57 with sensitive skin. Been using this eye cream for about 2 weeks and I see results! Less wrinkles, puffiness, and dark circles. ZERO irritation or pain, plus you have to use only the teeniest bit of product. It will last for ages. Amazing!

reviews.headline: Doesn't feel heavy
reviews.comments: This eye cream feels light on my skin and doesn't have a scent, which I like. A pea size is sometimes too much. I like it and will buy it again.

reviews.headline: Just OK
reviews.comments: I love Beekman 1802 in general and use many of their products.  This eye cream, though, is nice but nothing special.  It feels moisturizing but did nothing for fine lines and was no better than my usual local brand eye cream which feels better and is a fraction of the cost.  Too expensive for what it is, and will not re-purchase.

reviews.headline: I'm definitely will buy it again!
reviews.comments: The best of the skin care products I've ever used

reviews.headline: Terrible rash!
reviews.comments: I was sooo looking forward to trying this out. After using for 3 nights, I developed a terrible rash around my eyes! I'm not sure which ingredient(s) I'm allergic to. I hope others have a better experience.

reviews.headline: There is nothing like it
reviews.comments: This eye cream is amazing, I'm 51 years old I put this on under my concealer - and it makes a smooth surface for my concealer and no fine lines are visible.

Very well absorbed leaving the skin hydrated and plump
I would buy this product again and again
media.caption: Mushrooms milk

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Beekman 1802 Mushroom Milk Better Aging Eye Cream is boasted as a clinically proven eye cream that reduces fine lines and dark circles after using for 5 days. This formula utilizes goat milk, which is supposed to be very gentle and mimic the natural skin pH to help with absortion. This formula is more on the lighter-medium side, which is perfect for everyday use in the daytime and absorbs quickly. It goes on light and spreads easily and I've never had any irritation from this. After using this consistently, I have noticed that there is a brightness to my dark circles and gives a depuffed look - this could be due to the mushroom ingredients (Snow Mushroom, Reishi Mushroom) as well as Kojic acid for a brightened look. It keeps a hydrated look and does seem to smoothen out fine lines in this area. 

Due to the effects that I have noticed from the Beekman 1802 Mushroom Milk Better Aging Eye Cream - I would say that this product definitely supports its claims with the formula and is much better than other similar eye creams that I have tried. I think that the amount of product that is given is very generous and I love the simple squeeze tube packaging - it is minimal plastic waste and is sanitary. I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family who are looking for a new eye cream to try out. I feel that this product is targeted towards people in their teens-40s. Anyone above this age group may not benefit much from this product due to the need for deeper hydration and more active ingredients.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love Goat Milk

faceoff_negative.comments: I did receive this product for free in exchange for writing an honest review. It's hard to tell if a product is actually preventing / helping the looks of aging (how do you know what fine lines, etc you would've gotten had you NOT used the product?), so I can't really review on that. I can't say my eyes "looked more youthful  within 5 days." I feel like your skin needs more than 5 days to show the benefits of skin care. I did like the consistency of this product, and it absorbed well.  I tend to have a dryish eye area, and I felt this didn't moisturize the way other eye creams I've used had. After about 3-4 weeks of regular use, I can tell my eye area is dryer than before I started using this product. I did not experience dry patches/ flakiness, nor did I have any eye twitching problems (for real experienced side effect of some well known brands out there). If Mushroom Milk was great at moisturizing, I would continue to use this product. If you're eye are isn't dry, I say give the product a go. Otherwise, I'd hold off on this one.
faceoff_negative.headline: A little drying

rollup.name: Mushroom Milk Better Aging Eye Cream
